dcterms:creator: Allan Stisen
Henrik Blunck
Sourav Bhattacharya
Thor Siiger Prentow
Mikkel Baun Kjærgaard
Anind Dey
Tobias Sonne
Mads Møller Jensen
dcterms:description: This dataset contains readings from two motion sensors (accelerometer and gyroscope) recorded when users executed activities scripted in no specific order while carrying smartwatches and smartphones. It includes data from 9 volunteers performing 6 activities.
dcterms:title: Motion Sensor Dataset

dcterms:creator: Daniel Halperin
Wenjun Hu
Anmol Sheth
David Wetherall
dcterms:description: This dataset includes Channel State Information (CSI) data collected from a WiFi infrastructure, which can be affected by the presence of humans and their activities. It contains data from 11 volunteers performing 6 activities.
dcterms:title: WiFi Channel State Information (CSI) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Ke-Yu Chen
Daniel Ashbrook
Mayank Goel
Sung-Hyuck Lee
Shwetak Patel
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for human activity recognition based on ultrasound signals collected from 12 volunteers performing 6 different activities. The data is collected using an ultrasound generator and a smartphone.
dcterms:title: Ultrasound Activity Recognition Dataset

dcterms:creator: Tianxing Li
Qiang Liu
Xia Zhou
dcterms:description: This dataset captures human activity using visible light sensors, where readings are collected from photoreceptors detecting illuminance changes caused by body interactions. It includes data from 6 volunteers performing 4 hand gestures under different lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: Visible Light Activity Recognition Dataset
